title: Does taking COVID-19 test break fast? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: joad from emirates the question was does the covet 19 test where they put the swab in your nose does that break your arrow okay i will answer inshallah so is does covet 19 where they put the swap into your nasal cavity uh would that invalidate your fasting the answer is no there is nothing that went down your throat to your stomach there's no substance it's just a cotton swab and there's nothing wrong in that you
